info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 7:24PM EDT until March 31 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Elkhart County in north central Indiana... Northwestern Lagrange County in northeastern Indiana... Southeastern Cass County in southwestern Michigan... Southern St. Joseph County in southwestern Michigan... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 724 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Dunlap, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Elkhart, Goshen, Sturgis, Three Rivers, Dunlap, Simonton Lake, Middlebury, Constantine, Bristol, White Pigeon, Centreville, Union, Nottawa, Scott, Fawn River, Mottville, Burr Oak, Shipshewana, Brighton and Klinger Lake. This includes Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 92 and 127. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
